display_long_description:
Galaxy Kart is an arcade kart racing game focused on combat and the individual skill of each driver.

In a galaxy full of crazy racers, a frantic championship decides who is the best driver of all! 🏁

# ENHANCE THE BATTLE WITH ITEMS AND SKILLS
Use the unique skills of each character and grab power-ups to make your way to the finish line.

[media]

# RACE IN DIFFERENT GALAXIES
Explore a wide variety of maps, whether in a quick match or a tournament.

[media]

# PERSONALIZE YOUR RACER & KART
Unlock new characters and karts and mix and match from a wide range of unique combinations.

[media]

# CHALLENGE YOUR OPPONENTS
Race against bots or compete with other players in online matches.

[media]

Galaxy Kart brings the ultimate racing experience, filled with boosted features, including:
- 18 Unique Courses
- 6 Tournaments
- 9 Characters with 9 unique skills
- 9 Power-Ups
- 4 Levels of Difficulties (Easy, Normal, Hard and Challenge)
- 6 Players Multiplayer Mode
- Voice-Chat

Immerse yourself in this energetic kart game and drive among the stars using the movements of your HANDS!

Gear up, strap in, and prepare to embark on an unforgettable journey through the COSMOS! 🌌
